page.title: 07SATURDAY MORNING B/BRIGGS
page.content:
{Saturday Morning }
My gran is normally first up and she goes downstairs to unlock the doors and turn off the alarm system. My younger sister and I are next. We sit and watch T.V. for a while. My mum and dad are down shortly after. They have tea and toast while my sister and I have Ricicles. At long last about 11:00 am. my brother Anthony arises to tea and toast also. By this time my gran has been to 10:00 am. Mass in our local church Saint Matthew's and has brought something home for lunch. I have my lunch while watching 'Football Focus' on television.
